name: CalendarValidator_adjustToTimeZoneTest
description: Unit tests for the adjustToTimeZone method in CalendarValidator.

test_cases.name: testAdjustToTimeZoneSameRules
test_cases.description: Tests the adjustToTimeZone method when the original and new time zones are the same.

test_cases.name: testAdjustToTimeZoneDifferentRules
test_cases.description: Tests the adjustToTimeZone method when the original and new time zones are different, ensuring that the calendar fields remain unchanged.
